fifo_cfg_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » FIFO Buffer

FIFO Configuration. More...

#include <fifo.h>

Collaboration diagram for fifo_cfg_t:

Detailed Description

This structure defines the static FIFO configuration.

Data Fields

uint32_t size
 The size of the buffer (only size-1 is usable)
 
char * buffer
 A pointer to the buffer.
